1.「あわわっ！ びっくりしたぁ！| アンタ 誰よ？: Aaah! You scared me! Who are you?

2.「へぇー <pc>っていうの。| アンタも デスマスターの志望者なんだぁ。: Wow, <pc>. So you're a death master|aspirant too.

3.「って そりゃ そっかー。| 墓石に囲まれた こーんな しんきくさいトコ| 呼ば: That's right, that's right. I wouldn't have|come unless I was called to such a scary place|surrounded by gravestones.

4.「あらあらぁ 正直な子は 好きよ～。| でも デスマスターを目指すからには| こ: Oh my gosh, I love an honest girl! But you'll|have to get used to this atmosphere if you|want to be a death master.

5.「アタシは ネリム。アンタと同じく| デスマスターを こころざす者だよ。| よっ: I am Nelim. Like you, I'm a death master with|a heart of gold. I'm the one who holds the|Death Master in my heart, just like you.

6.「わたくしは デスマスターの デズリン。| あなたに 手紙をさしあげた者よ。|: I am Deathlin, the Death Master. I'm the one|who wrote to you. Thank you for responding to|my call.

7.「わたくしの 弟子になると決心したなら| 一人前のデスマスターに してさしあげる: If you decide to become my apprentice, I will|make you a full-fledged death master.

8.「デズリン師匠に 手紙で呼ばれて| のこのこ やって来たものの| ひとりで 不安: I came here by myself after receiving a letter|from Master Deathlin, but I was worried about|being alone.

9.「そうそう デズ師匠ってば 自分で書いた| 参考書まで 用意してくれてるんだよ。: Oh yeah, Master Dez even wrote his own|reference book for me.

10.「うふふ。面と向かって言われると 照れるわ～。| 今後 み～っちり デスマスター:
Hmmm. It's embarrassing to hear you say that|to my face. From now on, I'm going to teach|you the ins and outs of death mastering.|
|Prepare yourself.

11.「さて <pc>さん。まずは こちらに来て| わたくしの話を 聞いてくださいな。: Well <pc>. First of all, come over|here and listen to what I have to say.

12.「しっかし こんな本まで出してる| デスマスターだなんて……尊敬しちゃうなぁ。: I can't believe you are a death master who has|even published such a book...I have a lot of|respect for you.
